data.name: NokNok
data.description:
NokNok puts recording front and center while including all the features and functions of a meeting and collaboration space.

Create your own room or NokNok yourself in. 

Solo or team, hereâ€™s what you can do:

Podcasting Camera:
Use our companion app to set points in space, and easily switch between different angles. Streams right to your pc with a built in recorder. 

Autopodcasting:
The camera will record those that are speaking automatically. This feature can record up to four people and a zoom out of everyone. So you can record just by yourself with ease. 

Team Rooms:
Persistent  rooms. Ideal for remote teams that want to have their own pocket dimension in VR. 

Memories:
Easily send images and text from your browser to your avatar and vice/versa. This works like Dumbledore's pensive, take things out of your head like memories.

Blackboards: 
Boards how they should be, when things were done the chalky way. Equipped with haptic feedback chalks.
